00028 ThThread::~ThThread()
00029 {
00031         if ( _thread != 0 )
00032         {
00034                 DWORD result = WaitForSingleObject( ( HANDLE )_thread, 1000 );
00035 
00040                 B_ASSERT( result == WAIT_OBJECT_0 );
00041 
00043                 CloseHandle( ( HANDLE )_thread );
00044         }
00045 }

00054 ThThread::IsCurrent()

00056         return ( GetCurrentThread() == ( HANDLE )_thread );
